column2: Hmm... Good.[~]This shall forever stand as proof that your skill surpasses mine.
I’m pleased to have met so fierce a warrior.[~]Ours was a duel to remember.
Whew... That’s for sure.[~]But it was a close one.
At least, no more travelers will get shorn in two.
Oh, and...I guess I owe Lann and Reynn a thank you as well.[~]Wherever they are.
